parameters.name: checkin
parameters.description: The check-in associated with this shortId.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique string identifier for this photo. ✓

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Seconds since epoch when this photo was created. ✓

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Start of the URL for this photo. ✓

parameters.name: suffix
parameters.description:
Ending of the URL for this photo.

To assemble a resolvable photo URL, take prefix + size + suffix , e.g. https://irs0.4sqi.net/img/general/ 300x500 /2341723_vt1Kr-SfmRmdge-M7b4KNgX2_PHElyVbYL65pMnxEQw.jpg .

size can be one of the following, where XX or YY is one of 36 , 100 , 300 , or 500 . XXxYY
original : the original photo's size
capXX : cap the photo with a width or height of XX (whichever is larger). Scales the other, smaller dimension proportionally
widthXX : forces the width to be XX and scales the height proportionally
heightYY : forces the height to be YY and scales the width proportionally
✓

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: Can be one of "public" (everybody can see, including on the venue page), "friends" (only the poster's friends can see), or "private" (only the poster can see) ✓

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: If present, the name and url for the application that created this photo. ○

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: If the user is not clear from context, then a compact user is present. ○

parameters.name: venue
parameters.description: If the venue is not clear from context, then a compact venue is present. ○

parameters.name: tip
parameters.description: If the tip is not clear from context, then a compact tip is present. ○

parameters.name: checkin
parameters.description: If the checkin is not clear from context, then a compact checkin is present. ○

info: This is the information of the API
